name: MalignantNeoplasmComplicationsRelatedToHipAndKneeProcedures
title: Malignant Neoplasm Complications Related To Hip and Knee Procedures
description: This set of values contains malignant neoplasm complications related to hip and knee procedures.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this data element is to identify patients diagnosed with malignant neoplasm complication related to hip and knee procedures.),(Data Element Scope: Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Diagnosis category.),(Inclusion Criteria: This set of values contains malignant neoplasm codes for complication related to hip and knee procedures.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
